quarkninja.mode.xqmode
Class SyntaxCheckerService

java.lang.Object
  quarkninja.mode.xqmode.SyntaxCheckerService
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
public class SyntaxCheckerService
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable

Syntax Checking Service for XQMode.
Fetches code from editor every few seconds, converts it into pure java and runs it through the Eclipse AST parser. Parser detects the syntax errors. Errors are passed on to Error Window to be displayed to the user. All this happens in a separate thread, so that PDE keeps running without any hiccups.

Author:
Manindra Moharana

mainClassOffset

public int mainClassOffset
How many lines are present till the initial class declaration? In basic mode, this would include imports, class declaration and setup declaration. In nomral mode, this would include imports, class declaration only. It's fate is decided inside preprocessCode() }:)

xyToOffset

public int xyToOffset(int x,
                      int y)
Converts a row no, column no. representation of cursor location to offset representation. Editor uses JTextArea internally which deals only with caret offset, not row no. and column no.

Parameters:
x - - row no.
y - - column no.
Returns:
int - Offset
